meanings.definition: The quality or state of being successive.
meanings.sent1: The successivenesses of the days passing by quickly made me realize how time flies.
meanings.sent2: The successivenesses of the numbers on the calendar helped me plan my schedule.
meanings.sent3: The successivenesses of the falling leaves in autumn created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The successivenesses of the waves crashing onto the shore reminded me of life's constant changes.
meanings.sent5: The successivenesses of the raindrops hitting the roof made a soothing rhythm.

meanings.definition: The fact of following in order or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The successivenesses of the students entering the classroom made the teacher smile.
meanings.sent2: The successivenesses of the cars in the traffic jam caused delays for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The successivenesses of the birds flying in formation looked like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent4: The successivenesses of the dominoes falling one after another was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The successivenesses of the footsteps approaching closer made my heart race.
